title: Phase
description: Phase is a super easy to use web-based animation tool. Design in Figma and Animate in Phase. It's simple to learn, if you can use Figma you can already use Phase. We have real time collaboration, teams, version control and file-link sharing. Import Lottie, SVG or straight from Figma. Export Lottie, mp4, or GIF, and use DevMode to handoff to your engineering team
